com.communote.server.core.security.iprange

Class IpRangeHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.security.iprange.IpRangeHelper

  • public class IpRangeHelper
extends Object
    Helper class for IpV6 address calculations.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      • ipInRange

        public static boolean ipInRange(String ip,
                                String start,
                                String end)
                         throws InvalidIpRangeException,
                                InvalidIpAddressException
        Checks if if the IP is in range.
        Parameters:
        ip - the ip
        start - the start of the range
        end - the end of the range
        Returns:
        true, if IP is in range
        Throws:
        InvalidIpRangeException - the invalid IP range exception
        InvalidIpAddressException - the invalid IP address exception

                          throws InvalidIpAddressException

        Returns:
        the IP as 128 bit integer
        Throws:

      • ipToString

        public static String ipToString(BigInteger ip)
        Transform the given 128 bit value to ipv6 notation.
        Parameters:
        ip - the ip
        Returns:
        the string in ipv6 notation

      • rangesToString

        public static String rangesToString(Collection<IpRange> ranges,
                                    String delimiter)
        Transform ranges to string. The method will first look for the stringRepresentation member of the IpRange and take it if it is not null. Otherwise the members start and end will be converted to an IPv6 IP address range.
        Parameters:
        ranges - the ranges
        delimiter - the delimiter
        Returns:
        the string

      • stringToRange

        public static IpRange stringToRange(String iprange)
                             throws InvalidIpRangeException,
                                    InvalidIpAddressException
        Parse an iP range.
        Parameters:
        iprange - the iprange
        Returns:
        the iP range
        Throws:
        InvalidIpRangeException - the invalid IP range exception
        InvalidIpAddressException - the invalid IP address exception

      • stringToRanges

        public static List<IpRange> stringToRanges(String text,
                                           String delimiter)
                                    throws InvalidIpRangeException,
                                           InvalidIpAddressException
        Parses multiple IP ranges.
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        delimiter - the delimiter
        Returns:
        a list of IP ranges
        Throws:
        InvalidIpRangeException - the invalid IP range exception
        InvalidIpAddressException - the invalid IP address exception

      • validateIP

        public static boolean validateIP(String ip)
        Validate ip. Accepts ipv4 and ipv6 notation.
        Parameters:
        ip - the ip
        Returns:
        true, if successful
